channel.title: ·٠•●ҳ̸Ҳ̸ҳ™Tuxscape V1 30+ customs (updated source)·٠•●ҳ̸Ҳ̸ҳ™
channel.description:
[size=20pt]COMMENT AND TELL ME HOW I DID[/size]
[size=20pt]Client link http://uppit.com/v/VC62DUDF [/size] [size=20pt]Source link http://uppit.com/t1yn71fuqwjj/Tuxscape_V1_source.rar[/size] Credits: Im sorry but i dont give credits because basically somehow everyone on this forums put something into ever source. So i would have to name tons of people.
This is my first source so please dont flame if it sucks shit. Just tell me what i need to improve on if it needs some work.
What i added or fixed.
I fixed d claws made special hit better and more smooth. Fixed Statius warhammer Fix vesta longsword Made almost all special attacks timed correctly Fixed following Made duping close to impossible Added a few minigames Moved some shops (I dont know why i put this its nothing big) Fixed shop prices(D bow and stuff use to be like 460gp) Cleaned up some of lag Added some new customs
In V2 you will expect Even more less lag New customs like top hat bandos whip and more... Fix dupes if i find more Make more minigames Change home Add fully working barrows Add fully working jad Fixing up all weapons ways of attacking Super anti syi Newer client And much much more...
[code]CUSTOM COMMAND IDS! D claws:8002 Dragon platebody:13665 Statius warhammer:6999 Vesta longsword:7000 Sacred whip:15510 D whip:15507 Bow sword:6818[/code] Look at item.cfg for all custom commands
Pictures
[img]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/4586/morecustoms.jpg[/img] [img]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/2057/vengeance.png[/img] Ancients
[img]http://img385.imageshack.us/img385/1177/copyofancients.png[/img] [img]http://img385.imageshack.us/img385/4110/copyofcustoms.png[/img] [img]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/756/copyofdclaws.png[/img] I like home at edgeville so you dont gotta walk for to pk.
[img]http://img174.imageshack.us/img174/2455/copyofhome.png[/img] Working lunars! [img]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/6410/copyoflunar.png[/img] Next 2 pictures are minigames [img]http://img174.imageshack.us/img174/9885/copyofminigames.png[/img] [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/738/copyofmoremini.png[/img] Pk shop
[img]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/5360/copyofpkshop.png[/img] Working pray zamfg!
[img]http://img174.imageshack.us/img174/9773/copyofprayer.png[/img] New custom skilling, 24 working trainable skills will be added in V2 [img]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/3926/copyofskilling.png[/img] [img]http://img174.imageshack.us/img174/4540/copyoftrain.png[/img] [img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/7755/copyofvesta.png[/img]
[size=20pt]Client link http://uppit.com/v/3F855LLC [/size] [size=20pt]Source link http://uppit.com/t1yn71fuqwjj/Tuxscape_V1_source.rar[/size]
If links become broken please comment on this page and i will get new links for you. Thank you

item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I legitimately never understood why people leech a server, find out how to add dclaws & customs, and then release it. Although I do enjoy some delta releases, this makes DSPK look like god. No one even plays private servers for custom items anymore, they play it typically to get away from RS.
